fields.summary: Different results when multiple if() functions are used

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.description:
Repeated UDAF with literals could produce wrong result.
This is not a common use case, nevertheless a bug.

hive> select max('pants'), max('pANTS') from t1 group by key;
 Total MapReduce CPU Time Spent: 0 msec
OK
pANTS	pANTS
pANTS	pANTS
pANTS	pANTS
pANTS	pANTS
pANTS	pANTS
Time taken: 296.252 seconds, Fetched: 5 row(s)
fields.summary: Repeated UDAFs with literals can produce incorrect result

comments.body:
Obvious change was to remove lowercase conversion in Phase1.
However it seems deeper than that.

[~ashutoshc] Could you take a look? I have other stuff in my plate right now.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12777223/HIVE-12590.patch
